document_data.caption: A map showing the Old Water in eastern Impiltur.
document_data.name: Old Water
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Water''', sometimes called '''Cold Water''', was a large lake found in eastern [[Impiltur]].
document_data.Geography: The lake sat downstream beyond [[Bluefang Water]] along [[Great Imphras River]]. This waterway was collectively referred to as [[Traders Bay]], and Old Water was the last step on its way to the [[Easting Reach]].
